Tips for preparing the dough:
Let the dough rise in closed container until double in size. Then divide the dough into portions and form dough balls.
Afterwards, let it ferment for 16 - 48 Hours in the fridge. Take out of the fridge 30 mins before forming the Pizza.
It might take a few tries to get it perfect, but you will get the hang of it!
